review.title: “Great Place to work!”
review.pros: Pros – Great staff here... Many have been here 20+ years, even up to 35 years. They value their employees and reward good work quickly. You don't go unnoticed here!
review.cons: Cons – Smaller company ~30 employees, not much upward mobility, but as the company grows there is growth for employees too
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep on a growth path! Stay innovative and more reliant on technology and less on manual efforts.
